amendment.description: To require annual reports on the liabilities and future costs of the Federal Government and its programs.

vote.text: Amendment SA 388 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 388 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S4259-4260; text: CR S4259) To require annual reports on the liabilities and future costs of the Federal Government and its programs.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 388 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 388 proposed by Senator Nickles for Senator Voinovich.
